text: join kids hat family [Music] tia can i have some more pasta but tofu your plate is already full you must finish what you have on your
plate before getting more you can have more pasta once you finish it what if we are left with no pasta at all when i finish my plate you remind me
of greedy gloria tofu now who is greedy gloria
greedy gloria once upon a time in a land far far away there lived a greedy princess named gloria she was never satisfied with what she had
and would always boast about her beauty oh mother look at my eyes aren't they beautiful oh dear yes they are you are the
prettiest but mother i wish i had bigger eyes aren't they small and i wish i had thicker hair gloria you look beautiful just the way you are
oh mother you won't understand what i want my dresses are old i want new clothes let's go shopping sweetheart you already have a lot of
clothes you haven't even worn some of those yet don't you understand mom these are old so what if i haven't worn any of those i bought them last week
oh gloria will you ever be satisfied with what you have it is never enough for me mother i want to eat food made of jewels and gold
you would never understand what i want i am a princess and as gloria said these words two little fairies hovered over her head and granted her wish
there was a boom of white light and gloria was taken to a beautiful palace oh where am i and who are all these people
gloria had a dozen of servants around her some carried a huge pile of clothes to her room some combed her hair while some polished her shoes ah stop it
don't touch my hair please get off my feet but the servants didn't stop gloria rushed to her room in anger to find some peace
as she entered a servant put a night robe on her while the other made her bed uh can i have some privacy please leave me alone
the attendants walked out at once gloria opened the cupboard and a big pile of glamorous clothes fell over her she screamed for help underneath the
heap of clothes oh no wha what is this mess a few attendants rushed to the room and helped her get out of the heap of endless clothes
oh please leave me alone take away these clothes i don't need them gloria got up and went for dinner only to see plates full of food made of
jewels and gold the breads were made out of gold and the peas were made out of precious ruby gloria exclaimed with happiness oh it's so beautiful
it must be delicious too food made of jewels and gold it's like a dream come true gloria picks up a loaf of the golden bread
and takes a bite with delight ah oh ouch that hurts this bread is so hard pass me the peas at once [Music]
oh my goodness what is this the peas too are so hard i can't chew this food is there anything that i can actually eat
do you have something edible in this oh so glamorous palace i'm going to my room take the food away gloria gets up and rushes to her room
her stomach is growling with hunger but poor gloria she got everything that she wished for yet she wasn't satisfied
i want to go home to my mother please i can't take this anymore this is too much what would i do with so many servants
and all this glorious food but i can't even consume it please please take me home i have learnt my lesson suddenly the fairies appear
and take gloria home she rushes to her mother's arms and sobs bitterly oh mother i have learnt my lesson i don't want anything
i don't want food made of precious jewels i don't want any more clothes i will never ask for unnecessary things now i i just want to stay here with you
oh my gorgeous gloria i am glad you learnt your lesson one should never boast about themselves and should always be grateful for
whatever they have yes mother yes i understand now and this way gloria learnt her lesson and became humble and grateful for whatever she had
that was a wonderful story tia just like gloria i have learnt my lesson too i will always be grateful and happy for what i have [Music]
for your favorite rhymes stories and more join kids heart family subscribe here
[Music]
